Reviews.Title: Outstanding tv
Reviews.Author: Thomas H. Coyle
Reviews.Content: This Vizio 22 inch came out in late November. It has full 1080p with 5000-1 contrast and 2 hdmi inputs. I love this Little Puppy. The color and clarity are supurb. Sams Club has them for 298.00. They sold out in my Rochester,NY very quickly. They expect more in very soon.Great buy for a lot of neat features.

Reviews.Title: Love my VIZIO 22" widescreen!!
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Moon
Reviews.Content: I bought mine at Sam's Club also,,, $289.00, it was real easy to set-up with my Direct TV receiver & DVD/VCR!!  It has an excellent picture."I got a VIZIO!" I love it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice, but----
Reviews.Author: Harold Vordos
Reviews.Content: If I was able to select stations manually on digital, it would have earned a five star rating with us.

Reviews.Title: For son & his games
Reviews.Author: RatMarie
Reviews.Content: My son actually bought this TV with his hard earned money so he could play his video games. He is quite happy with it. Although they forgot the remote when it shipped, but responded immediately and sent it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sports true High Definition television performance
VO chassis design proven successful in larger VO series products
Features a built-in ATSC/NTSC tuner and a PC input
Significantly less reflection and glare
Ideal in any room lighting situations
ProductInfo.Name: Vizio 22" VO22LHDTV10A 720p Widescreen LCD HDTV
